languages.text: {n}Броня Уралона Жестокого расписана свежей кровью — вероятно, пленников, взятых в недавней битве.{/n} "Надеюсь, ты вкусил{mf||а} наслаждение от {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}истребления ложноверцев{/d} в полной мере, {name}".

{n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Броня Уралона Жестокого расписана свежей кровью — вероятно, пленников, взятых в недавней битве.{/n} "Надеюсь, ты вкусил{mf||а} наслаждение от {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}истребления ложноверцев{/d} в полной мере, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of eradicating the godless worms, {name}."

{n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

languages.text: {n}残酷なウラロンのアーマーは鮮血で彩られていた…おそらく、先の戦いで捕らえられた囚人のものだろう。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}神をも恐れぬ虫けら共{/d}を一掃するそのひとときを、楽しんでいただけたことを願うぞ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}残酷なウラロンのアーマーは鮮血で彩られていた…おそらく、先の戦いで捕らえられた囚人のものだろう。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}神をも恐れぬ虫けら共{/d}を一掃するそのひとときを、楽しんでいただけたことを願うぞ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}残暴者乌拉隆的盔甲上沾着新鲜的血迹，很可能是最后这场战斗中被俘的敌人流下的鲜血。{/n}“那些违逆真理的蛆虫，我希望你充分享受{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}屠杀它们{/d}的每一刻，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}残暴者乌拉隆的盔甲上沾着新鲜的血迹，很可能是最后这场战斗中被俘的敌人流下的鲜血。{/n}“那些违逆真理的蛆虫，我希望你充分享受屠杀它们的每一刻，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}L'armure d'Uralon le Cruel est maculée de sang frais... Probablement celui des prisonniers capturés lors de la dernière bataille.{/n} « J'espère que vous avez savouré chaque instant de l'{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}éradication de ces vermines impies{/d}, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'armure d'Uralon le Cruel est maculée de sang frais... Probablement celui des prisonniers capturés lors de la dernière bataille.{/n} « J'espère que vous avez savouré chaque instant de l'éradication de ces vermines impies, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}La armadura de Uralon el Cruel está adornada con sangre fresca, probablemente de los prisioneros capturados en la anterior batalla.{/n} «Espero que hayas disfrutado {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}erradicando a los gusanos paganos{/d}, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La armadura de Uralon el Cruel está adornada con sangre fresca, probablemente de los prisioneros capturados en la anterior batalla.{/n} «Espero que hayas disfrutado erradicando a los gusanos paganos, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Die Rüstung von Uralon dem Grausamen ist mit frischem Blut beschmiert ... vermutlich dem Blut der in der letzten Schlacht gemachten Gefangenen.{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr habt es genossen, diese {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}gottlosen Würmer auszulöschen{/d}, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Rüstung von Uralon dem Grausamen ist mit frischem Bllut beschmiert ... vermutlich dem Blut der in der letzten Schlacht gemachten Gefangenen.{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr habt es genossen, diese gottlosen Würmer auszulöschen, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Zalim Uralon'un zırhı, taze kanla bezenmiş. Kan, muhtemelen son muharebede ele geçirilen tutsaklara ait.{/n} "Umarım {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}ilahsız ödleklerin kökünü kurutmaktan{/d} zevk almışsındır {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The armour of Uralon the Cruel is adorned with fresh blood — likely that of the prisoners captured in the last battle.{/n} "I hope that you relished every moment of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}eradicating the godless worms{/d}, {name}."
